title: Microsoft - Official Home Page
description: Explore Microsoft products and services for your home or business. Shop Microsoft 365, Windows, Azure and more. Find downloads and get support.

p: The next-generation of games. Your goals. Friends and family. Windows 11 was made to bring you closer to everything you love.
World-class performance with more privacy, more productivity and more value while you browse.
Save your files and photos to OneDrive and access them from any device, anywhere.
Organise your notes and your life.
Save time and focus on the things that matter most with AI in Microsoft 365 for business.
Get the most comprehensive IDE for .NET and C++ developers on Windows for building web, cloud, desktop, mobile apps, services and games.
Online meetings, chat and shared cloud storage – all in one place.
Securely stream your Windows experience from the Microsoft cloud to any device.
h1: Unlock your potential with Microsoft Copilot
h2: Designed for life today – and tomorrow
h3: Welcome to your Windows 365 Cloud PC
